util.runtime.jvm

Class SysPropJvmArg

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.runtime.BaseProgramArgument<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>
      • util.runtime.jvm.SysPropJvmArg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandBuilder, ProgramArgument<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>

    public class SysPropJvmArg
extends BaseProgramArgument<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>
    A Java system property argument to pass to the JVM.

      • toJvmArguments

        public static <K,V> java.util.stream.Stream<SysPropJvmArg> toJvmArguments(java.util.Map<K,V> props)
        Converts the given properties into a stream of system property arguments, filtering out properties having a null or empty key or having a null value.
        Type Parameters:
        K - key type.
        V - value type.
        Parameters:
        props - the key-value pairs to convert.
        Returns:
        the converted props.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
